scenario_text.value: Kaito... So this is where you were!

Huh? Oh, it’s you, man. I was just wandering
around the school and ended up here.

I’m used to seeing these woods now, but...
they creeped me the hell out at first.
Oh, really?
This is the definition of normal to us.

Sure, it may be run-of-the-mill scenery to
all of you who are from this world.

But you ain’t gonna see a sea of red spider
lilies in most places where we’re from.

Yeah, I’ve only ever seen them like that
around the shrine back in our world.

Can’t say we have them anywhere else I’ve
ever been.

Right? And to be honest, my memories of them
aren’t all that cheerful.

Heh... We wandered into this world through
a forest of red spider lilies...

I didn’t have a freakin’ clue what was going
on. We got separated, and I lost Miu.
That was rough.

Yeah? I guess, but that’s also the reason you
and me met, right?
Uh, if you say so...

Oh! Kaito’s face is starting to turn red,
like the spider lilies!
Wha-?! No it ain’t!

(He’s trying to hide his embarrassment, but
I bet Kaito feels the same as Dracumon.)

(Meeting him here, reuniting with the rest of
us...)

(He had blinders on about Miu at the start,
and was stubborn as a mule.)

(But at one point he became a friend who
cared more about his friends than anyone.)
(I’m super grateful for Kaito myself.)

(Still, I doubt he’d just take the compliment
if I said it to his face.)

(Instead of thanking him directly, maybe
a show of appreciation would be better...?)
(How should I show my feelings to Kaito?)
Thanks, man.
I’m counting on you.
Thanks, man.

Kaito... I’m glad you’re one of the friends
that came to this world with me.
Thanks, man, really.
Yo, you too, Takuma?!
Jeez, you guys’re wigging me out, for real!
Ahaha! Kaito’s turning all red again!
Aww, don’t be bashful, Kaito!
Shut up! I’ll bashful your brains in!
I’m counting on you.
You know how you feel about meeting Dracumon?

I feel the same way about you, man. I’ll keep
counting on you!

Wh-what?! How can you say something so
awkward with a straight face?!
I can’t believe you!

Pffft, AHAHAHA! Your face’s red as a beet,
you dope!
Ahahaha! Yeah, a big old beet!
Who the hell said you punks could laugh?!

This is all because Takuma here don’t got
a filter!
It ain’t my fault, I tell ya!
Uh, was that really so weird?

Hell yeah, it was! Hairs are standing on the
back of my neck over here...
(That’s a bit extreme...)

Well... Shit, guess that’s just the guy you
are. Honest to a fault.

I guess it ain’t so bad, if you’re the one
saying it... Maybe.

Sheesh, you really don’t know how to express
your feelings, do ya?
And you, get off my back, ya little heckler!
Anyway... One thing’s for sure!

We’ll save Miyuki no matter what...and
everyone else with her!

So let’s keep up the good fight... Right,
Takuma?!
Yeah! That goes without saying!

We’ll rescue Miyuki and save our world! Ain’t
no buts about it!
Let’s fight our way through to the end, man!
